abstract: Editorial commends New York City Mayor Michael Bloomberg for supporting City Council bill that would place sensible limits on city's efforts to help federal government detain and deport illegal immigrants who pose no threat to the community; notes that bill coincides with Pres Obama's more compassionate approach to focus solely on dangerous criminals.
snippet: Mayor Bloomberg supports a bill that would place sensible limits on the city’s efforts to help the federal government detain and deport illegal immigrants who pose no threat.
